content.question:
Directions: For each question in this part, you will hear a brief exchange between two people. From the four choices, choose the most appropriate remark that the Ô¨Årst speaker could make in response to the remark of the second speaker. 
NOW GET READY FOR THE BRIEF EXCHANGE:

choices.label: Seid ihr wirklich zu Hause geblieben?
Warum seid ihr dann nicht geflogen?
Hatte das mit dem Pilotenstreik zu tun?
Was war denn los mit eurem Auto?

content.answer: Hatte das mit dem Pilotenstreik zu tun?

unit.text: 5: Factors That Impact the Quality of Life

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe the literal meaning of the text.
